Prop.Name: Container class
Prop.Description: Class used to style the QueryViewer's container.

Prop.Name: Value class
Prop.Description: Class used to style the element's value.

Prop.Name: Title class
Prop.Description: Class used to style the element's title.

Prop.Name: Value class
Prop.Description: Class used to style the maximum and minimun values.

Prop.Name: Title class
Prop.Description: Class used to style the maximum and minimum titles.

Prop.Name: Opacity
Prop.Description: Transparency of the chart's background. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

Prop.Name: Color
Prop.Description: Background color for the chart's labels.

Prop.Name: Opacity
Prop.Description: Transparency of the chart's labels background. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

Prop.Name: Border color
Prop.Description: Color of the chart's labels border.

Prop.Name: Border width
Prop.Description: Width of the chart's labels border.

Prop.Name: Background color
Prop.Description: Background color for the chart's tooltip.

Prop.Name: Background opacity
Prop.Description: Transparency of the chart's tooltip background. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

Prop.Name: Border color
Prop.Description: Color of the chart's tooltip border.

Prop.Name: Border width
Prop.Description: Width of the chart's tooltip border.

Prop.Name: Background color
Prop.Description: Background color for the chart's legend.

Prop.Name: Background opacity
Prop.Description: Transparency of the chart's legend background. Valid values are between 0 and 1.

Prop.Name: Border color
Prop.Description: Color of the chart's legend border.

Prop.Name: Border width
Prop.Description: Width of the chart's legend border.
